description:
Rally’s mission is to create a social network that is ad-free, where user data will never be sold and where those that use their talent and hard work to build communities will never be disintermediated. Rally gives brands a dedicated channel where they can engage their audience, offer rewards for actions that promote their content or community and give access to exclusive content or experiences that users earn with their rewards.

name: Rally
